trans-unit.source: Enables the creation of service routes over HTTP for WCF Services with support for extension-less base addresses.
trans-unit.target: Permite a criação de rotas de serviço através de HTTP para serviços do WCF com suporte para endereços base sem a extensão.

trans-unit.source: When the ServiceRoute constructor is called, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] will add the corresponding route prefix (url pattern) and a (hidden) route handler to the ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>, and cache the corresponding route prefix, service host factory and service type info into an internal hash table for future service activation.Note: if developers directly manipulate the route collection on a ServiceRoute which has been added to the collection, the change may not be granted by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Quando se chama o construtor de ServiceRoute, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] irá adicionar o prefixo de rota correspondente (padrão de url) e um processador de rota (oculto) para o ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>e colocar em cache o prefixo de rota correspondente, a fábrica de anfitrião do serviço e informações de tipo de serviço para uma tabela hash interno para a ativação do serviço futuras. Nota: se a programadores manipular diretamente a coleção de rotas num ServiceRoute que foi adicionado à coleção, a alteração pode não ser concedida pelo [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].</xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] changing elements in a route collection, see <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]alterar elementos de uma coleção de rota, consulte <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>.</xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that developers define all ServiceRoute in the global.asax file and do not remove a ServiceRoute from the <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection> dynamically.
trans-unit.target: É recomendado que os programadores definem todos os ServiceRoute no ficheiro global. asax e não o remover um ServiceRoute do <xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>dinamicamente.</xref:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute"></xref> class with the specified route prefix, service host factory, and service type.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activation.ServiceRoute"> </xref> classe com o prefixo de rota especificado, a fábrica do serviço de anfitrião e o tipo de serviço.
